name: Fill Size and Color Material Request
script:
frappe.logger().info(f"[MR ITEM] Script triggered for item {doc.item_code}")

if doc.item_code:
    result = frappe.call(
        "almoosa_customization.api.get_item_attributes",
        item_code=doc.item_code
    )

    attrs = result.get("message") if result else None

    frappe.logger().info(f"[MR ITEM] Extracted attrs: {attrs}")

    if attrs:
        doc.custom_color = attrs.get("color")
        doc.custom_size = attrs.get("size")
